comment_0: no actually, i read in a magazine that she wrote this song because when she was in elementary school she was bullied because she was ugly, and she is saying that in this song that no matter what you look like people will like you for who u r not for what you look like.

comment_5: I think this song is just inspiring people to be themselves and that they are perfect just the way they are.

comment_7: The meaning of this song is pretty obvious. It doesn't matter who you are- you're beautiful EXACTLY the way you are. And if someone tells you otherwise, they're not worth your time. This song carries the same meaning as "Just the Way You Are" and "Born This Way." You're amazing and perfect as you, so don't change or let anyone make you feel inferior. Love and accept you for who you are.
